bean.description: 根据itemId获取该商品具有的属性值(如白色,32G,联通版),以属性排序号和属性值排序号升序

constructor-arg.value: SELECT a.id itempropertyId,b.value propertyvalueName FROM t_pd_item_properties a LEFT JOIN t_pd_property_value b on a.propertyvalue_id= b.id LEFT JOIN t_pd_property c on c.id=a.property_id where a.item_id=:itemId and c.lifecycle!=2 ORDER BY c.sort_no asc,b.sort_no asc

bean.description: 根据itemCode获取该商品的预售基本信息

constructor-arg.value: select * from t_sto_presell_item where itemId=:itemId and lifecycle!=2
